description: Updates an existing event destination in a configuration set. You can update the IAM role ARN for CloudWatch Logs and Firehose. You can also enable or disable the event destination. You may want to update an event destination to change its matching event types or updating the destination resource ARN. You can't change an event destination's type between CloudWatch Logs, Firehose, and Amazon SNS.

parameters.name: ConfigurationSetName
parameters.description: The configuration set to update with the new event destination. Valid values for this can be the ConfigurationSetName or ConfigurationSetArn.

parameters.name: EventDestinationName
parameters.description: The name to use for the event destination.

parameters.name: MatchingEventTypes
parameters.description: An array of event types that determine which events to log. (string) ---

parameters.name: CloudWatchLogsDestination
parameters.description: An object that contains information about an event destination that sends data to CloudWatch Logs. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon CloudWatch destination. The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you want to record events in.

nested_params.name: IamRoleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon CloudWatch destination.

nested_params.name: LogGroupArn
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you want to record events in.

parameters.name: KinesisFirehoseDestination
parameters.description: An object that contains information about an event destination for logging to Firehose. The ARN of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon Data Firehose destination. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

nested_params.name: IamRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon Data Firehose destination.

nested_params.name: DeliveryStreamArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

parameters.name: SnsDestination
parameters.description: An object that contains information about an event destination that sends data to Amazon SNS. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic that you want to publish events to.

nested_params.name: TopicArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic that you want to publish events to.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the ConfigurationSet that was updated.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration set.

nested_items.name: EventDestination
nested_items.description: An EventDestination object containing the details of where events will be logged.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: When set to true events will be logged.

nested_items.name: MatchingEventTypes
nested_items.description: An array of event types that determine which events to log.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsDestination
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about an event destination that sends logging events to Amazon CloudWatch logs.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon CloudWatch destination.

nested_items.name: LogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you want to record events in.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseDestination
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about an event destination for logging to Amazon Data Firehose.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon Data Firehose destination.

nested_items.name: DeliveryStreamArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

nested_items.name: SnsDestination
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about an event destination that sends logging events to Amazon SNS.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic that you want to publish events to.
